name: Avoid Obstacles
description:
As a free game, Avoid Obstacles is easy to play you just need to drag the ball and avoid it from hitting the shapes.

There are two modes Infinite and Level :-
Infinite :- As the name suggests in this you can compete against your friends and make highest score meaning its an endless.
The avoided obstacles get collected as points through which you can buy things.

Levels :- There are also levels in which you can get rewards after it gets completed (more levels will be added soon).
